entry.title: Barry M. Goldwater Scholarship Nomination
entry.content:
I have been nominated to advance to the national round of the Barry M. Goldwater Scholarship for the 2016 scholarship competition. The Goldwater Scholarship is the highest recognition given by the United States Government in recognition of undergraduate excellence in research in science and engineering. American universities may nominate up to 4 candidates to the national contest after a competitive internal selection process on the basis of acdemic record and a research proposal. Results of the competition will be made public in late March 2016.

Barry M. Goldwater Scholarship Nomination was originally published by Ethan Alexander García Baker at Ethan Alexander García Baker on January 30, 2016.

entry.title: Chancellor's Undergraduate Research Fellowship
entry.content:
I have been named a Chancellor’s Undergraduate Research Fellowship for the Spring 2016 semester. This award is in support of my thesis work on a neuroinformatic approach to characterizing autonomic regulation in response to vestibular stimuli.

Chancellor's Undergraduate Research Fellowship was originally published by Ethan Alexander García Baker at Ethan Alexander García Baker on January 08, 2016.

entry.title: Test Post Please Ignore
entry.content:
Welcome to the internet, me.

This website runs on the super rad Jekyll platform through GitHub Pages. That means it’s totally open source and you can see the code for the entire site in my GitHub repo for this site. I’ve modified the very nice Minimal Mistakes theme to build this site (also open-source).

Test Post Please Ignore was originally published by Ethan Alexander García Baker at Ethan Alexander García Baker on November 01, 2015.
